description: The Butterfly Bush (Buddleja davidii 'Ellen's Blue') is truly a sight to behold! This majestic shrub is ideal for gardeners in search of beauty and year-round color in their landscape. It is a deciduous plant, meaning it will lose its leaves and bloom in the summer months. The plant produces stunning lavender-blue flowers that are hugely attractive to butterflies, and its scent is simply delightful. With its bright foliage, fragrant blooms, and overall stunning display, the Butterfly Bush is sure to be the shining star of your outdoor space.
